attributes.action: Abolish Housing developments surrounding the area of Weycock Cross, Barry
attributes.additional_details:
Abolish plans for proposed housing developments at Weycock Cross, Barry. To prevent further congestion on Pontypridd Road and Port Road, which would cause more damage to the road surface, adding further to spiraling costs of repairs to the numerous potholes in the area.

This petition also appeals to protect the surrounding areas inhabited by species of bat, badgers, foxes and hedgehog.

Further housing in this area would cause dramatic decline to the wildlife of the area

Please sign to protect the area from further development.
